plugin.name: global_vars
plugin.author: Ruthgul
plugin.purpose: stores & retrieves global variables to be used by other plugins
plugin.description:
.---------------. | global_vars | `---------------'
Stores & retrieves global variables to be used by other plugins.
These variables are non-persistent. They'll get nuked on close / logout / relogin.
Syntax: * var <name> - shows the contents of a stored variable * vars - shows the contents of all stored variables
Author: Ruthgul
Latest version: http://github.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts

muclient.script:
----------------- -- plugin stuff -----------------
function OnPluginInstall() Tell("-- " .. GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID (), 1) .. ": type ") ColourTell("silver", "black", GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID (), 1) .. " help") Note(" to see info about this plugin --") end
function OnHelp () ColourNote("silver", "black", world.GetPluginInfo(world.GetPluginID (), 3)) Note("") ColourNote("silver", "black", "(this version: " .. os.date("%c", GetPluginInfo (GetPluginID(), 14)) .. ")") end
function OnPluginConnect() nuke_all_vars() end
function plugin_update_url() local t = { "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts/master/src/global_vars.xml", } return (table.concat(t, ";")) end
-------------- -- variables --------------
function do_show_variable(name, contents) Note("-- global_vars - variables --") local var1 = GetVariable(name) if (var1) then Note("MUSH variable '" .. name .. "': '" .. var1 .. "'") end
local var2 = contents if (var2) then if (type(var2) == "table") then var2 = serialize.save_simple(var2) end Note("Lua variable '" .. name .. "': '" .. var2 .. "'") end
if (not var1) and (not var2) then Note("no such variable") end end
function do_show_all_variables() Note("-- global_vars - variables --") for k, v in pairs(GetVariableList()) do Note(k, " = ", v) Note("") end end
function nuke_all_vars() for k, v in pairs(GetVariableList()) do DeleteVariable(k) end end
function set_global_var(name, value) local aux
if (value) then aux = SetVariable(name, value) else aux = DeleteVariable(name) end
BroadcastPlugin(1, name)
return aux end
function get_global_var(name) local aux = GetVariable(name) return aux end
